Reviews.Title: Great product for the money!
Reviews.Author: Bre
Reviews.Content: I was not expecting much from this product, just a cheap camera to take when my husband and I go hiking, but it actually turned out to be a good cam for so cheap! You'll need to go get your own sd card, but that is easy enough! Also what is extremely helpful is that you don't have to use the rechargable batteries, all you need are two AA batteries which is awesome when you're not around a plug in.

Reviews.Title: nice little camera a good purchase
Reviews.Author: howardhillard
Reviews.Content: i tried the camera as soon as i recieved it. it actually suprized me.i would recemend it to anyone who is looking to buy one.

ProductInfo.Features:
GE W1233 12MP Digital Camera with 3X Optical Zoom and 2.4 Inch LCD
Uses 2 AA batteries so you'll never be stranded waiting for your camera battery to charge
ProductInfo.Name: Ge Digital Camera
